column5: It stinks but it kind of tastes good.  Now I know that sounds weird and I do not go around eating/drinking the stuff but on several occasions I have put my hands in my mouth after touching the gulp alive bait and it tastes nothing like what it smells.  It has a really sweet taste. I recently find that I have been putting my hands in my mouth more and more after handling the gulp alive bait (but lets keep that on the downlow)  PS  That stuff really works well especially drop shotting for bass.  Wow! Too bad my whole bag and jacket stink of the juice though.
lol i cant believe i just read that.  to funny  i have heard great things about it as bait.  i may have to try it but not taste it lol  cheers!
Ummmmm ... you have read the "not for human consumption" warnings right? Side effects may include: Making a post on OFC about the taste of your favourite fishing lures. LOL!
I don't eat the rubber part (just chew on it a bit) LOL
Do you find yerself checking out the bodies on the lady bass of late, by any chance?  JF
John, when it comes to bass, we're all looking for pigs.
Ah, to be young again.  JF
